name: Augie's City Island Deli
address: 520 City Island Ave, Bronx, NY 10464, USA

reviews.text: They're always so sweet and helpful! Food is great!!

Can only speak in regards to the ice cream I purchased & srvc. Wanted to go for something more refreshing so I went with the coco icee. Horrible decision. Tons of artificial coco sweetener. I was also waiting next in line and the guy at the register proceeded to check out 2
others before me. Lol. Maybe it‚Äôs because he was on the phone taking orders‚Ä¶.Left a little sour taste in my mouth but whatever. I don‚Äôt come here often.
Chicken parm sandwich is best in NY state!
Incredible chicken parm and broccoli rabe
Great service, friendly atmosphere
Great heroes, pizza looked good too- maybe next time.

Shrimp wasn‚Äôt cleaned when I called to inform them it wasn‚Äôt cleaned there processed to tell me their kitchen is one of the cleanest on city island , I was there in 1.0 seconds this is disgusting ü§Æ
A nice local place to pick up good tasting pizza and other choices.  Plus it's close to other places for local dining.

We only ordered catering service from them for our daughter wedding few years ago , and couple of times for the big gathering last year and this year. They have a great catering menu. The owner and stuff were always helpful with choice and‚Ä¶
My favorite pizza place.

One of the few places to order a slice of pizza. Not the best but not the worst. Good empanadas and beef and cheese patties. People working there were pretty nice. I'd recommend to try if you're in the area
The pizza üçï here is freaking great..... I come all the way from long Island paying tools and all to get a slice‚Ä¶
best customer service, best pizza; everything is good here.
I got two slice pizza but they were huge. I loved it
Nice place and the workers where give you good customer service üëç‚Ä¶

Wide variety of hot & cold sandwiches , pizza, calzones, Italian dishes, soups, burgers, salads & appetizers. Sells beer, chips, ice cream in a freezer. Had a chicken parm Sicilian slice, it was good.
The deli guy got my sandwich right this time without asking for our order in detail 6 times.
Cashier seemed like he had an attitude sorry I came to bring you money
The pizza was delicious. I love the cheese they use on their original slices. üòã Plus, they were very generous with the size of the slices. I will be back for more.‚Ä¶
Great food and pizza
Not bad in a pinch deli .
Good hot turkey sandwich and friendly service.
Excellent food.
I been going there for years no complaints everything is freshly made & the food is good, I highly recommend going there..
Never been there before but I was treated like family very nice place
They're good at just about everything.

Great burgers, good sandwiches and pizza. We order takeout from them most weekends.
Food tasting good and great prices
Pizza cheap and big. Best deal on city island.
Good sandwich good price
Another review this deli has pizza and it's very good.

Anthony's, Augie's, The Deli... dealers choice. A City Island staple for locals, fishermen and workers alike. Friendly, fast service. Great selection of food for breakfast, lunch and dinner. Dining in EXTREMELY limited, so plan to take food‚Ä¶
My to go deli for breakfast everyday, sandwiches on point.
This deli has a big menu; I decided to try the eggplant parmigiana and I‚Äôm speechless the flavor, texture and presentation was really good
They got very good wings and there shrimp parm is very good.

Delicious food
Pizza is delicious
Great service
Great food and friendly service.

Ample street Parking available on week days. Weekends will be a little of a challenge.  The pizza shop is centrally located in City Island BX NY.  The pizza shop is also a shared space with a grocery store. Seating is limited. Limited by two tables. However, the pizza is very delicious and made fresh as you go.

Best deli in city island. Classic heroes, pizza is on the spot. Augie is the best and his staff are on point with that place. Keep up the good work. Highly recommend this place for lunch and delivery.

I went in to order a chicken cutlet. They microwaved the chicken and added it into the hero bread. The chicken was dark, and hard you could not chew it. I ended up throwing out the sandwitch. The slice was burned underneath and the sauce was sour. I wish i could give -5 stars. Wont be going there anymore.

We just moved here but been coming here all my life and Me and my family love this place! the  Food the people are the best in city island period!! never ever disappointed thank you guys so much see you next weekend
Cheap and delicious lunch special each week day - besides the City Island Chinese restaurant this is the only good low cost place in City Island. Pizza and sandwiches are great too.
Always treat me great when I go, pizza so good, food always delicious üòã, the margarita pizza is amazing‚Ä¶
Great food n variety, always tastes fresh and made on site. Bern going here for years.
Love the people and inexpensive food. Good portions and the lunch specials are a great deal.
Pizza was still cold. Warm at the edges only the rest was cold as if I'm guessing it was frozen for overnight
Great food and service and their Italian ices are the best on the island
Great food and staff best bacon cheeseburger out.
Pizza was really good. I don't eat pizza much but it was good.
If u goin fish dats da spot 4 ur sandwiches n drinks
Makes great sandwiches and even makes pizza. Love it!
This place was a life saver. An oasis in the desert. Just fantastic
I didn't visit this place I want you to The Bar Next Door. Call fellas same owner i think
